atk_abil: Normal Attack: Attacks enemies with multiple arrows, slowing their movement speed.
Skill Attack: Summons ice pillars to trap multiple enemies in an ice prison.
Special Ability 1: Increases movement, attack speed and attack range of Orc and Undead by 2%.
Special Ability 2: Cloaks the unit to stealthily infiltrate the enemy base to destroy it.
Special Ability 3: Increases the basic speed of the game by 2%.
Special Ability 4: First attack is dodged 100% by taking a step back. (Cloak will be removed)

Inner Passion: Increases all abilities (attack/defense/HP) of units by 2 levels. ([Inner passion] can only be used in stages. [Inner passion] is accrued when applied, but the unit abilities cannot increase to more than +100 level. This is activated even when units are in the Time Shop.)
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Attacks enemies with multiple arrows, slowing their movement speed.
Skill Attack: Summons ice pillars to trap multiple enemies in an ice prison.
Special Ability 1: Increases movement, attack speed and attack range of Orc and Undead by 4%.
Special Ability 2: Cloaks the unit to stealthily infiltrate the enemy base to destroy it.
Special Ability 3: Increases the basic speed of the game by 5%.
Special Ability 4: First attack is dodged 100% by taking a step back. (Cloak will be removed)

Inner Passion: Increases all abilities (attack/defense/HP) of units by 5 levels. ([Inner passion] can only be used in stages. [Inner passion] is accrued when applied, but the unit abilities cannot increase to more than +100 level. This is activated even when units are in the Time Shop.)

buffs.description: Increases all abilities (attack/defense/HP) of units even if Naga is in the Time Shop. (Only applies to stages) (5-star 2 levels, 6-star 5 levels, Max 100 levels).
